net.truelicense.core.auth

Class Notary

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.truelicense.core.auth.Notary
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Authentication

    public final class Notary
extends Object
implements Authentication
    Signs or verifies a generic artifact using the private or public keys in a key store entry. This class is immutable.
    Author:
    Christian Schlichtherle

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Decoder sign(RepositoryController repository, Object artifact)
      Encodes and signs the given artifact and returns a decoder for it.
      Decoder verify(RepositoryController repository)
      Verifies the signature of the encoded artifact in the underlying repository model and returns a decoder for it.

    • Method Detail

      • sign

        public Decoder sign(RepositoryController repository,
                    Object artifact)
             throws Exception
        Description copied from interface: Authentication
        Encodes and signs the given artifact and returns a decoder for it. As a side effect, the state of the underlying repository model is updated with the encoded artifact and its signature so that a subsequent verification can succeed.
        Specified by:
        sign in interface Authentication
        Parameters:
        repository - the controller for the repository for encoding the artifact to.
        artifact - the artifact to sign.
        Returns:
        An Artifactory for decoding the signed artifact in the repository.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • verify

        public Decoder verify(RepositoryController repository)
               throws Exception
        Description copied from interface: Authentication
        Verifies the signature of the encoded artifact in the underlying repository model and returns a decoder for it. The state of the underlying repository model is not modified by this method.
        Specified by:
        verify in interface Authentication
        Parameters:
        repository - the controller for the repository for decoding the artifact from.
        Returns:
        An Artifactory for decoding the verified artifact in the repository.
        Throws:
        RepositoryIntegrityException - if the integrity of the repository with its encoded artifact has been compromised.
        Exception
